Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENERGY AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENERGY AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS
AMENDED BY RESTORING TO PREVIOUS PRINT 1163A

Title: Relates to net energy metering for fuel-flexible linear generator electric generating equipment
Summary: Relates to net energy metering for fuel-flexible linear generator electric generating equipment.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to net energy metering for fuel-flexible linear generator electric generating equipment
